cause.description:
A warrior is someone who is engaged energetically in an activity, cause or conflict.
Now, more than ever, we are all becoming aware of the need to conserve our precious living heritage.
We all need to take time to consider ways in which we may be contributing to the detriment of the environment and what we can do about it!
We don't own planet Earth, we belong to it.
Each and every one of us can be a Wildlife Warrior on a local, national and international level, fighting to protect our wilderness and wildlife.
As a Wildlife Warrior, you will become part of a global 'wildlife force' that will be working hard to preserve our natural environment. Become a Wildlife Warrior now!
1. To protect and enhance the natural environment
2. To provide information and education to the public and raise awareness of wildlife issues
3. To undertake biological research
4. To research, recommend and act in the protection of threatened or endangered species.
5. To enter into cooperative arrangements with like-minded organisations
cause.mission: To be the most effective wildlife conservation organisation in the world through the delivery of outstanding outcome-based programs and projects, and inclusive of humanity
cause.name: Wildlife Warriors Worldwide
